// GPS recorded taxi-/flightplan

navlights on
strobelights on
set apcontrol plane
set speedunits knots
set distanceunits miles
set userinput on
set speed 5
maintain speed
run apv

stop apv
stop aph
head ch
set speed 0.
operate wheelbrake
wait 2.
release wheelbrake
flaps 0.
end
